<Text: Henrik Dorsin:  Dorsin started his career as an extra in the 1995 film Vinterviken.>

Text: Henrik Dorsin:  He then worked as a revue-artist and dramatist, he produced the revue Slängar av sleven, and has participated in shows with the theater group Stockholms blodbad.
